org.vast.ows

Class OWSCapabilitiesWriterV0

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vast.ows.AbstractResponseWriter<OWSServiceCapabilities>
      • org.vast.ows.OWSCapabilitiesWriterV0
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OWSResponseWriter<OWSServiceCapabilities>

    public abstract class OWSCapabilitiesWriterV0
extends AbstractResponseWriter<OWSServiceCapabilities>

    Base writer for all service capabilities based on the pre-version of OWS common (here called v0)

    Author:
    Alex Robin
